trans-unit.source: Aerial Modification
trans-unit.target: 翔空改装

trans-unit.resname: AER·1 | Aerial Modification | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature or Vehicle\nAs long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物或载具 只要所结附的永久物是载具，它便额外具有生物此类别。 所结附的生物得+2/+2且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Aeronaut Admiral
trans-unit.target: 空行统帅

trans-unit.resname: AER·2 | Aeronaut Admiral | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nVehicles you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由你操控的载具具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The Consulate recruits its best pilots from the League of Aeronauts. Many go on to command entire fleets.
trans-unit.target: 空行团不断为执政院输出优秀驾手。其中多数进而接掌整支舰队。

trans-unit.source: Aether Inspector
trans-unit.target: 乙太检察官

trans-unit.resname: AER·3 | Aether Inspector | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 当CARDNAME进战场时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{E}{E}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Aethergeode Miner
trans-unit.target: 乙太岩矿工

trans-unit.resname: AER·4 | Aethergeode Miner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).\nPay {E}{E}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。 支付{E}{E}：放逐CARDNAME，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Gremlins in the wild feed on nodules of pure aether, which are also prized by miners.
trans-unit.target: 至纯乙太结核是野生怪灵的珍馐，也是矿工的至宝。

trans-unit.source: Airdrop Aeronauts
trans-unit.target: 运补空行师

trans-unit.resname: AER·5 | Airdrop Aeronauts | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nRevolt — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 反抗～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则你获得5点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Supplies inbound. Keep that pressure on."
trans-unit.target: 「补给就位。保持压力。」

trans-unit.source: Alley Evasion
trans-unit.target: 暗巷匿踪

trans-unit.resname: AER·6 | Alley Evasion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn.\n• Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ • 目标由你操控的生物得+1/+2直到回合结束。 • 将目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Sure, you know the law. But I know the streets."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然你精通法律，但我更熟悉街道。」

trans-unit.source: Audacious Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 大胆渗透者

trans-unit.resname: AER·7 | Audacious Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被神器生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "This little critter can turn all of you to scrap in under thirty seconds! Come on, who wants to be the first to go? Try and stop me!"
trans-unit.target: 「这小家伙不消半分钟就能把你们全部变成废铁！来啊，谁想先来试试？有本事就来拦我啊！」

trans-unit.source: Bastion Enforcer
trans-unit.target: 骁勇堡执法者

trans-unit.source: Headquartered at the Bastion of the Honorable, the Consulate's enforcers are charged with the impossible task of keeping the peace.
trans-unit.target: 执政院的执法部队主力驻扎在骁勇堡内，肩负着维系社会安宁这项无尽重任。

trans-unit.resname: AER·9 | Call for Unity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call for Unity
trans-unit.target: 团结呼声

trans-unit.resname: AER·9 | Call for Unity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a unity counter on CARDNAME.\nCreatures you control get +1/+1 for each unity counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 反抗～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则在CARDNAME上放置一个团结指示物。 CARDNAME上每有一个团结指示物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: AER·9 | Call for Unity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The "leaking spire" stands for liberation from Consulate control.
trans-unit.target: 「渗漏尖塔」含义是从执政院治下得到解脱。

trans-unit.resname: AER·10 | Caught in the Brights | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Caught in the Brights
trans-unit.target: 束手就擒

trans-unit.resname: AER·10 | Caught in the Brights | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.\nWhen a Vehicle you control attacks, exile enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。 当一个由你操控的载具攻击时，放逐所结附的生物。

trans-unit.resname: AER·10 | Caught in the Brights | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: While hunting aether, a gremlin may ignore other stimuli, including threats to its own life.
trans-unit.target: 怪灵在觅夺乙太时往往眼中无它，就连可能危及生命的东西都能视而不见。

trans-unit.source: Consulate Crackdown
trans-unit.target: 执政院镇压

trans-unit.resname: AER·11 | Consulate Crackdown | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile all artifacts your opponents control until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐所有由对手操控的神器，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.source: "The workshops are silent. Our creations have been seized. They have killed what made us alive."\n—Pia Nalaar
trans-unit.target: 「工作室已然静寂无声。我们的心血造物都被掠夺殆尽。他们彻底扼杀了我们的生存之本。」 ～琵雅纳拉

trans-unit.source: Conviction
trans-unit.target: 使命感

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+3.\n{W}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+1/+3。 {W}：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "There is no greater coward than one who believes in nothing."
trans-unit.target: 「毫无信仰的人最为懦弱。」

trans-unit.resname: AER·13 | Countless Gears Renegade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Countless Gears Renegade
trans-unit.target: 众械乱匠

trans-unit.resname: AER·13 | Countless Gears Renegade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Revolt — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 反抗～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: AER·13 | Countless Gears Renegade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Go forth and cause trouble, my little one!"
trans-unit.target: 「小家伙们，去吧，尽情捣乱！」

trans-unit.source: Dawnfeather Eagle
trans-unit.target: 曙羽雄鹰

trans-unit.resname: AER·14 | Dawnfeather Eagle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+1且获得警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: "It came to rest upon the angel's arm, and then the weight of their gazes fell upon me."\n—Aeronaut's journal
trans-unit.target: 「它徐徐落在天使臂弯上，我顿时感受到了它那份凝重的目光。」 ～空行师日志

trans-unit.source: Deadeye Harpooner
trans-unit.target: 神准鱼叉手

trans-unit.resname: AER·15 | Deadeye Harpooner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Revolt — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, destroy target tapped creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 反抗～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则消灭目标由对手操控且已横置的生物。

trans-unit.source: "It seems there's even better hunting down here."
trans-unit.target: 「似乎云下的捕猎更精彩。」

trans-unit.source: Decommission
trans-unit.target: 除役

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.\nRevolt — If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。 反抗～如果本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "A key weakness in the design is its vulnerability to repeated, forceful blows."
trans-unit.target: 「其设计中的主要缺陷，在于反复重击便能造成致命损坏。」

trans-unit.source: Deft Dismissal
trans-unit.target: 快速打发

trans-unit.resname: AER·17 | Deft Dismissal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target attacking or blocking creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对一个，两个或三个目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成共3点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.source: "With spy thopters all around, how can the consuls be so blind to Tezzeret's manipulations?"\n—Gideon Jura
trans-unit.target: 「到处都是监视用的振翼机，执政官怎么可能不晓得泰兹瑞在作什么手脚？」 ～基定尤拉

trans-unit.source: Exquisite Archangel
trans-unit.target: 精雅大天使

trans-unit.resname: AER·18 | Exquisite Archangel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nIf you would lose the game, instead exile CARDNAME and your life total becomes equal to your starting life total.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 如果你将输掉这盘游戏，则改为放逐CARDNAME且你的总生命成为等同于你的起始总生命。

trans-unit.source: A living invention born of a grand design.
trans-unit.target: 宏伟设计造就的灵动发明。

trans-unit.source: Felidar Guardian
trans-unit.target: 护卫晶角兽

trans-unit.resname: AER·19 | Felidar Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile another target permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐另一个目标由你操控的永久物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: The loyalty of a felidar is hard won but worth the effort.
trans-unit.target: 晶角兽的信赖虽极难赢得，但其忠诚值得为之奋斗。

trans-unit.source: Ghirapur Osprey
trans-unit.target: 吉拉波鹗

trans-unit.resname: AER·20 | Ghirapur Osprey | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Many airship captains keep pets that share their love of the sky.
trans-unit.target: 许多飞船船长身旁，都有同样热爱蓝天的宠物陪伴。

trans-unit.source: Restoration Specialist
trans-unit.target: 修复专家

trans-unit.resname: AER·21 | Restoration Specialist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return up to one target artifact card and up to one target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {W}，牺牲CARDNAME：将至多一张目标神器牌和至多一张目标结界牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Dwarves' tools are priceless heirlooms handed down through generations.
trans-unit.target: 矮人手中工具乃是代代相承的传家至宝。

trans-unit.source: Solemn Recruit
trans-unit.target: 庄严新员

trans-unit.resname: AER·22 | Solemn Recruit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Double strike\nRevolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 连击 反抗～在你的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "I can no longer sit in my workshop and ignore the events outside. My hammers strike for the people of Ghirapur."
trans-unit.target: 「我不能继续两耳不闻窗外事，一心埋首工作间。我手中双锤为吉拉波人民而战。」

trans-unit.resname: AER·23 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sram, Senior Edificer
trans-unit.target: 资深建筑师斯勒姆

trans-unit.resname: AER·23 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放灵气，武具或载具咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AER·23 | Sram, Senior Edificer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As this conflict grows, it gets harder to prevent the city from breaking down. How much longer can we keep this machinery balanced?"
trans-unit.target: 「随着冲突愈演愈烈，眼下越来越难维持城市完整不至毁坏。这样的机械平衡还能维持多久？」

trans-unit.source: Sram's Expertise
trans-unit.target: 斯勒姆的专才

trans-unit.resname: AER·24 | Sram's Expertise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.\nYou may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 派出三个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。 你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "It's important to always have the right tool for the job. This one is for picking my teeth."
trans-unit.target: 「做事务必选好工具，不可大材小用。这就是给我用来剔牙的。」

trans-unit.source: Thopter Arrest
trans-unit.target: 振翼机缉捕

trans-unit.resname: AER·25 | Thopter Arrest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的神器或生物，直到CARDNAME离开战场为止。

trans-unit.source: The Consulate's eyes—unblinking, unsleeping—are everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 执政院眼线无休无眠，无处不在。

trans-unit.source: Aether Swooper
trans-unit.target: 乙太攫击兵

trans-unit.resname: AER·26 | Aether Swooper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{E}{E}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Aethertide Whale
trans-unit.target: 乙太潮巨鲸

trans-unit.resname: AER·27 | Aethertide Whale | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E} (six energy counters).\nPay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你得到{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}（六个能量指示物）。 支付{E}{E}{E}{E}：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: "To survive up here, I've learned when to use my harpoon and when to just enjoy the view."\n—Kadhu, skywhaler
trans-unit.target: 「为了在这里求生，我学会何时该使用鱼叉，何时该欣赏美景。」 ～飞鲸猎手克杜

trans-unit.resname: AER·28 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baral, Chief of Compliance
trans-unit.target: 监察长巴罗

trans-unit.resname: AER·28 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.\nWhenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的瞬间与法术咒语减少{1}来施放。 每当由你操控的咒语或异能将咒语反击时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AER·28 | Baral, Chief of Compliance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."
trans-unit.target: 「寂静回响是我耳中天籁。」

trans-unit.source: Baral's Expertise
trans-unit.target: 巴罗的专才

trans-unit.resname: AER·29 | Baral's Expertise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return up to three target artifacts and/or creatures to their owners' hands.\nYou may cast a card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 将至多三个目标神器和／或生物移回其拥有者手上。 你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于4的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "Get out of my way."
trans-unit.target: 「别挡我的路。」

trans-unit.source: Bastion Inventor
trans-unit.target: 骁勇堡发明家

trans-unit.resname: AER·30 | Bastion Inventor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nHexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标。）

trans-unit.source: "This armor transcends the limitations of mere flesh and bone."
trans-unit.target: 「这副盔甲可突破血肉之躯的极限。」

trans-unit.source: Disallow
trans-unit.target: 不予承认

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语，起动式异能或触发式异能。（其目标不能是法术力异能。）

trans-unit.source: "How easily your flames are quenched."\n—Baral, Chief of Compliance
trans-unit.target: 「熄灭你的火焰易如反掌。」 ～监察长巴罗

trans-unit.source: Dispersal Technician
trans-unit.target: 离散技师

trans-unit.resname: AER·32 | Dispersal Technician | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标神器移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: As renegade forces closed in on the Aether Spire, Consulate blockades failed one by one.
trans-unit.target: 乱匠们迫近乙太尖塔，执政院的防线节节败退。

trans-unit.source: Efficient Construction
trans-unit.target: 高效建造

trans-unit.resname: AER·33 | Efficient Construction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: For some of Ghirapur's aerowrights, building thopters is a byproduct of larger construction efforts.
trans-unit.target: 对吉拉波部分煅空匠而言，振翼机不过是建设大型工程时顺手造出来的东西而已。

trans-unit.source: Hinterland Drake
trans-unit.target: 内陆龙兽

trans-unit.resname: AER·34 | Hinterland Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME can't block artifact creatures.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME不能阻挡神器生物。

trans-unit.source: "As a kid, I dreamed of flying on those wild drakes. They inspired me to build wings of my own."\n—Nadja Cloudtoucher, aerowright
trans-unit.target: 「小时候我曾梦想能够驾驭野生龙兽翱翔蓝天。正是它们激发了我要亲手打造翅膀的念头。」 ～煅空匠触云娜杰

trans-unit.source: Ice Over
trans-unit.target: 覆以寒冰

trans-unit.resname: AER·35 | Ice Over | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact or creature\nEnchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 结附于神器或生物 所结附的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "Slow the Consulate with whatever you've got!"\n—Jasi Ganin, master siphoner
trans-unit.target: 「竭尽所能拖住执政院！」 ～汲能大师嘉丝格宁

trans-unit.source: Illusionist's Stratagem
trans-unit.target: 幻影师谋略

trans-unit.resname: AER·36 | Illusionist's Stratagem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 放逐至多两个目标由你操控的生物，然后将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "When everything hangs on a single moment, be sure you choose the right moment."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「命悬一刻时，务必找准时机。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.resname: AER·37 | Leave in the Dust | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: AER·37 | Leave in the Dust | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The daredevil racers of the Derby Crows, long at odds with the Consulate, were quick to join the renegades in open revolt.
trans-unit.target: 迅鸦会的玩命赛手素与执政院不睦，如今更果断加入乱匠公开叛乱。

trans-unit.source: Mechanized Production
trans-unit.target: 机械化生产

trans-unit.resname: AER·38 | Mechanized Production | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact you control\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的神器 在你的维持开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为所结附的神器之复制品。然后如果在所有由你操控的神器中，彼此同名的神器有八个或更多，你便赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: "Give me eight walkers, I'll give you the city."\n—Dovin Baan
trans-unit.target: 「给我八台巨像，我就能保全城安宁。」 ～多温班恩

trans-unit.source: Metallic Rebuke
trans-unit.target: 聚金拒斥

trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nCounter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付 {1}。） 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{3}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."\n—Tezzeret

trans-unit.source: "It is fascinating to see how the people of this plane replicate magical techniques without a natural gift. Also frustrating."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「此时空的人民不需要天赋便可复制魔法技艺，令人称奇。但也令人沮丧。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: "Let's just broaden its surveillance lens."

trans-unit.source: Escapes should always be daring.

trans-unit.source: "The tools of the past will help us forge the future."

trans-unit.target: 如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于2，则消灭之。 反抗～如果本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则改为如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于4，则消灭之。

trans-unit.source: Resourceful Return
trans-unit.target: 机智归返

trans-unit.resname: AER·70 | Resourceful Return | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If you control an artifact, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。如果你操控神器，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: When the salvage team brought in the shattered gearhulk, a wave of excitement swept through the renegade foundry.
trans-unit.target: 当回收队带回粉碎的巨械时，乱匠铸造厂爆出欢呼声浪。

trans-unit.source: Secret Salvage
trans-unit.target: 隐秘回收

trans-unit.resname: AER·71 | Secret Salvage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland card from your graveyard. Search your library for any number of cards with the same name as that card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标非地牌从你的坟墓场放逐。从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量与之同名的牌，展示这些牌，并将它们置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: There is no shortage of illegal salvage in Ghirapur, nor of those who are willing to profit from it.
trans-unit.target: 吉拉波的非法回收活动不少，乐于从中获利的人也不缺。

trans-unit.source: Sly Requisitioner
trans-unit.target: 狡黠骗徒

trans-unit.resname: AER·72 | Sly Requisitioner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nWhenever a nontoken artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Vengeful Rebel
trans-unit.target: 复仇反抗军

trans-unit.resname: AER·73 | Vengeful Rebel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Revolt — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 反抗～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则目标由对手操控的生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Some aetherborn joined the rebellion for profit, others for the sake of their freedom, still others for revenge.
trans-unit.target: 乙太种加入叛乱之目的各不相同：有的是为了谋取利益，有的则是为了争取自由，还有的则是为了复仇雪恨。

trans-unit.resname: AER·74 | Yahenni, Undying Partisan | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Yahenni, Undying Partisan
trans-unit.target: 永生抗军耶赫尼

trans-unit.resname: AER·74 | Yahenni, Undying Partisan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\nSacrifice another creature: Yahenni gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 牺牲另一个生物：耶赫尼获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AER·74 | Yahenni, Undying Partisan | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The time for subtlety is over, darling."
trans-unit.target: 「亲爱的，遮遮掩掩的时代结束了。」

trans-unit.source: Yahenni's Expertise
trans-unit.target: 耶赫尼的专才

trans-unit.resname: AER·75 | Yahenni's Expertise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.\nYou may cast a card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。 你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "The Consulate pushed me to my limit, darling, and this is the result."
trans-unit.target: 「执政院逼我用尽全力，亲爱的，这就是结果。」

trans-unit.source: Aether Chaser
trans-unit.target: 乙太追逐客

trans-unit.resname: AER·76 | Aether Chaser | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进战场时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{E}{E}。若你如此作，则派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Chandra's Revolution
trans-unit.target: 茜卓的革命

trans-unit.resname: AER·77 | Chandra's Revolution | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成4点伤害。横置目标地。该地于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: Chandra was driven by her anger, directed particularly at the man who had taken her father from her.
trans-unit.target: 茜卓怒不可遏，将满腔忿恨全数撒在从她身边夺走父亲的元凶身上。

trans-unit.source: Destructive Tampering
trans-unit.target: 擅动致灾

trans-unit.resname: AER·78 | Destructive Tampering | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Destroy target artifact.\n• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ • 消灭目标神器。 • 不具飞行异能的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "I don't think they'll appreciate my . . . adjustments."\n—Karavin, renegade saboteur
trans-unit.target: 「他们大概不会喜欢我所做的. . .调整。」 ～乱匠破坏者克勒温

trans-unit.source: Embraal Gear-Smasher
trans-unit.target: 安布洛碎械匠

trans-unit.resname: AER·79 | Embraal Gear-Smasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲一个神器：CARDNAME向每位对手各造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "A well-made wrench is a versatile, indispensable tool."
trans-unit.target: 「做工精良的扳手是必备的多用途工具。」

trans-unit.source: Enraged Giant
trans-unit.target: 盛怒巨人

trans-unit.resname: AER·80 | Enraged Giant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nTrample, haste
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 践踏，敏捷

trans-unit.source: When fighting spilled over into Giant's Walk, the aether weapons and swooping airships angered the normally placid creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当战火波及到巨人路径时，乙太武器和呼啸飞船激怒了素来温和的生物。

trans-unit.source: Freejam Regent
trans-unit.target: 费李杰龙侯

trans-unit.resname: AER·81 | Freejam Regent | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nFlying\n{1}{R}: CARDNAME gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 拼造（此咒语能用你的神器来协助施放。你起动完法术力异能之后每横置一个神器，就能为此咒语支付{1}。） 飞行 {1}{R}：CARDNAME得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The dragons perching in Freejam's towers symbolize the zone's fierce independence.
trans-unit.target: 栖息在费李杰高塔上的巨龙代表了这块区域彪悍的独立性。

trans-unit.source: Frontline Rebel
trans-unit.target: 前线反抗军

trans-unit.resname: AER·82 | Frontline Rebel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source: "Will you be strong and stand with me?"
trans-unit.target: 「你会坚定地与我并肩作战吗？」

trans-unit.source: Gremlin Infestation
trans-unit.target: 怪灵侵扰

trans-unit.resname: AER·83 | Gremlin Infestation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact\nAt the beginning of your end step, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to enchanted artifact's controller.\nWhen enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, create a 2/2 red Gremlin creature token.
trans-unit.target: 结附于神器 在你的结束步骤开始时，CARDNAME对所结附之神器的操控者造成2点伤害。 当所结附的神器置入坟墓场时，派出一个2/2红色怪灵衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Hungry Flames
trans-unit.target: 贪婪烈焰

trans-unit.resname: AER·84 | Hungry Flames | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成3点伤害，并对目标牌手造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.
trans-unit.target: 面对在基岚之心号舱内意图下手破坏多温班恩，茜卓还以火爆回击。

trans-unit.source: Indomitable Creativity
trans-unit.target: 无畏创新

trans-unit.resname: AER·85 | Indomitable Creativity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle their libraries.
trans-unit.target: 消灭X个目标神器和／或生物。为每个以此法消灭的永久物进行以下流程～其操控者从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张神器或生物牌为止，放逐该牌。这些牌手各将所放逐的牌放进战场，然后将各自的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Invigorated Rampage
trans-unit.target: 受激狂乱

trans-unit.resname: AER·86 | Invigorated Rampage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.\n• Two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ • 直到回合结束，目标生物得+4/+0且获得践踏异能。 • 直到回合结束，两个目标生物各得+2/+0且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: Gremlins can change from pest to problem to plague in the span of a moment.
trans-unit.target: 只消片刻，怪灵就能从不足挂齿变成棘手问题再到恐怖灾难。

trans-unit.resname: AER·87 | Kari Zev, Skyship Raider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
trans-unit.target: 飞船大盗卡丽泽夫

trans-unit.resname: AER·87 | Kari Zev, Skyship Raider | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike, menace\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, create a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token named Ragavan that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 先攻，威慑 每当CARDNAME攻击时，派出一个传奇的2/1红色，名称为勒格文的猴衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。在战斗结束时放逐该衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AER·87 | Kari Zev, Skyship Raider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Aboard her ship, the *Dragon's Smile*, Kari follows no one's rules but her own.
trans-unit.target: 上了龙笑号飞船后，卡丽泽夫就只会遵守自己订下的规矩。

trans-unit.resname: AER·88 | Kari Zev's Expertise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kari Zev's Expertise
trans-unit.target: 卡丽泽夫的专才

trans-unit.resname: AER·88 | Kari Zev's Expertise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature or Vehicle until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.\nYou may cast a card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 获得目标生物或载具的操控权直到回合结束。将之重置。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 你可以从你手上施放一张总法术力费用等于或小于2的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: AER·88 | Kari Zev's Expertise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I was made for this!"
trans-unit.target: 「我正是为此而生！」

trans-unit.source: Lathnu Sailback
trans-unit.target: 勒图帆背蜥

trans-unit.source: Travelers to Lathnu, high on the Devra Cliffs, need not fear the political strife of Ghirapur . . . but they have other dangers to worry about.
trans-unit.target: 勒图地处德沃勒崖高处，前往该地的旅行者虽无需担忧吉拉波的政治斗争. . .但他们需要担心其他危险。

trans-unit.source: Lightning Runner
trans-unit.target: 迅雷奔越者

trans-unit.resname: AER·90 | Lightning Runner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Double strike, haste\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}. If you pay, untap all creatures you control, and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 连击，敏捷 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物），然后你可以支付{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}。若你支付，则重置所有由你操控的生物，且在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.source: "Catch me if you can."
trans-unit.target: 「有本事就来抓我呀。」

trans-unit.source: Pia's Revolution
trans-unit.target: 琵雅的革命

trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to your hand unless target opponent has CARDNAME deal 3 damage to him or her.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的神器从战场进入你的坟墓场时，除非目标对手让CARDNAME对他造成3点伤害，否则将该牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Pia's passion was directed at the big picture—at making real, lasting change.
trans-unit.target: 琵雅的心血则全数倾注在了大局上～倾注在为真正实现长久改变的奋斗上。

trans-unit.source: Precise Strike

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+0且获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Hit where it hurts, and always hit first."
trans-unit.target: 「朝着弱点打，先下手为强。」

trans-unit.source: Quicksmith Rebel
trans-unit.target: 迅匠反抗军

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target artifact you control gains "{T}: This artifact deals 2 damage to target creature or player" for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，目标由你操控的神器获得「{T}：此神器对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: "Let's add just a bit more stopping power."
trans-unit.target: 「再增加一点止敌火力。」

trans-unit.source: Ravenous Intruder
trans-unit.target: 贪婪入侵者

trans-unit.source: "I've made some fine acquisitions of late, so I'm planning to make commensurate improvements to my security systems. I have a consultant coming tomorrow."\n—Kurna Majan, Luminary League
trans-unit.target: 「余近日购得珍玩数件，故欲将保全系统修葺一新，以相般配。明日已约顾问前来洽谈。」 ～名仕盟的库纳默金

trans-unit.source: Reckless Racer

trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当CARDNAME成为横置时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Illegal street races turned out to be perfect practice for avoiding Consulate patrols.
trans-unit.target: 非法的街头赛车最适合用来练习避开执政院的巡逻队。

trans-unit.source: "Peace? Its sole purpose is fear."\n—Saheeli Rai

trans-unit.source: Prizefighter Construct
trans-unit.target: 争耀组构体

trans-unit.source: The Scrappers, an underground group with a passion for automaton brawls, had renegade leanings even before the Consulate's crackdown. It didn't take long for them to lend their best brawlers to the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 拆解手是个热衷于机械兽互搏的地下团体，早在执政院镇压前就已倾向乱匠。他们不久便派出最好的搏斗械加入战团。

trans-unit.source: Renegade Map
trans-unit.target: 乱匠地图

trans-unit.resname: AER·173 | Renegade Map | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "We have safe houses in every zone, but you'll never find one without this."
trans-unit.target: 「我们在每一区都有安全居所，没这地图的话你一个都找不到。」

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命且得到{E}{E}{E}（三个能量指示物）。

trans-unit.source: Renegade supply lines are, by necessity, mobile and difficult to disrupt.
trans-unit.target: 迫于形势，乱匠的补给线既机动灵活，又难以滋扰。

trans-unit.source: Scrap Trawler
trans-unit.target: 废铁打捞械

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个由你操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，将目标在你坟墓场中且总法术力费用小于前述神器的神器牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或从战场进入坟墓场时，派出一个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: The Consulate prizes innovation when it is dependable and replicable.
trans-unit.target: 执政院器重那些可靠且可复制的创造发明。

trans-unit.source: Treasure Keeper

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到你展示出一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所有以此法展示且未施放的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: "A few drops of this, and the trickiest problems simply melt away."\n—Thamaz, Weldfast inventor

trans-unit.source: Rules and rails are made to be broken.

trans-unit.target: 乱匠用来对抗执政院的组构体，原本的用途大多不是战斗。但有些不需多做改动就能派上用场。

If you search your library this way, shuffle it.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Prevent all combat damage a creature of your choice would deal this turn.

trans-unit.source: Beyond the chaos of Ghirapur lies a vibrant world where aether flows through nature.
trans-unit.target: 在混乱不堪的吉拉波之外，是一片生机盎然的世界，那里的乙太在自然中川流不息。

Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.\n−3: Target opponent loses life equal to the number of artifacts you control.\n−8: Gain control of all artifacts and creatures target opponent controls.
